channel.title: So, how do you like RS07?
channel.description:
Give me your opinions of RS07, what do you like about it, not like about it, or anything they could have done better.
Please don't talk about bots/graphics/gameframes

item.title: So, how do you like RS07?
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

now i wont have to walk into varrock and be crashed by 1k lvl 3’s spamming *****.COM ****.NET TRY US 4 GP I SWER LEGIT NO SCAM DUDE and DICE WITH US MAKE BILLS OH HEY U SCAM ME NO RIP CASH STACK I QUIT NO NEBER I H8 U JAGEX Y U MAKE ME ROLL LOW DICE FML I QUIT SUICIDE ATTEMPT GAWL

item.title: So, how do you like RS07?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

It’s pretty cool. I would no life it much more than I am now if I had some kind of guarantee it’ll be up and running for more than a year. Though, one thing I’m really hoping for is that Jagex backs off from it a little bit. I’d rather not start seeing quests with new items like Korasi and Torva and Potion flasks, or new skills like summoning and whatnot. I want the game to remain challenging, where it takes 1-2 trips to kill the Kalphite Queen, not getting 6 kills in one inventory with a pack yak. The first update that does anything like that then I’m seriously just gone.

Either way, great to be back.

Read full topic
item.source: So, how do you like RS07?

item.title: So, how do you like RS07?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Well, if I recall the RSC community was incredible after it came back. All of the assholes stuck with RS2 and the RSC community grew a bit. I think that the assholes will stay with the current RS and not go back to 07, as they see it as a downgrade.

Read full topic

item.title: So, how do you like RS07?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:11, topic:494133”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=612366.msg4237614#msg4237614 date=1361654508]

Won’t play, going to be filled with 2k11 kids, etc,.

It isn’t. Community’s actually enjoyable.
[/quote]This.[/quote]
Yeah, I haven’t seen many “rofl troled u l2lmaopk L” kids, they probably couldnt play because it wasnt SUPER CPU INTENSIVE L337 graphics and 3 BILLION EXP AN HOUR DICING ROFLMAO
When I need help I actually get people to trade me and give me food, someone gave me ham robes when I was struggling to get some, as compared to normal rs, if I did that I’d probably get “L get ur own scrub” or “poor scrub?” or “rofl ur gona get droped by low level monster L scrub!!!”

Its pretty good
